extendedInfo.description: *Have a problem with the app starting and staying blank with Samsung Galaxy S3.Work around by turning on Developer options and checking the box for 'Disable Hardware overlays'.--------A picture book about animals coming over to celebrate your child's birthday. By changing the name, age and gender of the main character, your child can take center stage in their own story! Your child will enjoy placing candles on the cake, and guesing which animal is at the door since the order changes everytime you play. Ages 1-6 (App settings allow up to 9 years old) Background Music: "odekake biyori" provided by Amacha Music Studios.
